content: One of the attendees on today's call asked if there was a list of SDC implementations anywhere. The answer was "no, but that's a really good idea". So I've created a page. Please fill in what you've done - and poke the authors of any other implementations/tools you're aware of. @Paul Lynch @Ye Wang @Brian Postlethwaite @Grahame Grieve @Ana Kostadinovska @Nagesh Bashyam
I suppose that might be helpful :) https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIRI/SDC+Implementations
I have a JV version of SDC for R3 does that count? :-)
I have a JV version of SDC for R3 does that count?

@Eric Haas Although one purpose of the SDC Implementation list could be a list things that others might try to use, another purpose could be to see how many (at least partial) implementations have been made. If you have concerns about some aspect of your "JV" implementation, you could always put a "caveat emptor" in the "product description" column.
